title: Exploring the Use of Academic Library Mobile Apps: Short-Term Workshops for Citizens

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learners consist of general citizens unfamiliar with digital resources in academic libraries; focus on apps applicable to language domains (e.g., foreign language learning, literature search)

learning_goals: Learners can describe three key features of an academic library mobile app.
Learners can select and plan the use of at least two mobile apps tailored to research and learning purposes.
Learners can share the process of exploring language-learning resources provided by a library app with peers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
